get.description: The landing page provides links to the API definition (link relations `service-desc` and `service-doc`), the Conformance declaration (path `/conformance`, link relation `conformance`), and other resources in the API.

externalDocs.description: The specification that describes this operation: OGC API - Features - Part 1: Core

get.description: The URIs of all conformance classes supported by the server. This information is provided to support 'generic' clients that want to access multiple OGC API implementations - and not 'just' a specific API. For clients accessing only a single API, this information is in general not relevant and the OpenAPI definition details the required information about the API.
